about_the_game:
"

End Times Campaign


The End Times are upon us.
What seems like a routine first assignment for the newest recruits to the Adventurers Guild takes an unexpected turn.  Who could know that a simple mission to clear some rats from a cellar could be the first step to saving the world?This Campaign takes a party of newly created Novice characters, and through twenty full adventures, turns them into Legendary characters capable of facing down an eternal threat.The Campaign is set in a generic fantasy world, and can easily be tweaked for an existing published or home created setting, or can just be run without any further work as it is.Ideal for those new to Savage Worlds or those with years of experience, the campaign includes maps for all encounters and the local setting, statistics for new creatures, treasures, NPC's and indeed everything you need to run the Campaign straight out of the book.Can your characters rise to the challenge of the End Times and save the world that they know?  

The Campaign makes significant use of the Savage Worlds Fantasy Companion and also the Savage Worlds Fantasy Skirmish book.This game references the Savage Worlds game system, available from Pinnacle Entertainment Group. Savage Worlds and all associated logos and trademarks are copyrights of PinnacleEntertainment Group. Used with permission.
"
